entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:19 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
